name: Airfix Dogfighter
description:
Airfix Dogfighter is a simulation-arcade game developed by Paradox Entertainment. It was originally released in 2000. EON Digital Entertainment published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Airfix Dogfighter has a score of 75. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Airfix Dogfighter on PC.
